summary.span: 命名空間提供能夠支援使用 Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) 之查詢的類別和介面。

span.span: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間位於 System.Core 中的組件 （system.core.dll 的參考）。The namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll). 類別包含[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]實作的物件運作的標準查詢運算子。The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . 類別包含[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]實作的物件運作的標準查詢運算子。The class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement . LINQ to SQL 的相關資訊，請參閱[LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
